text:
@realDonaldTrump 40 million people with no jobs, rising coronavirus infection rates in 18 states, 100,000 Americans dead in a pandemic that resulted from your criminal incompetence; and all you can do is crow about stock market gains only the very rich truly benefit from. 

Pathetic.
